completed_latest.description: Built /training stats page with real data from Garmin, Speediance, and 8Sleep

data_sources.speediance: speediance_dashboard_data.json — 125 sessions, 1,296,447 lbs, 78 exercises with PRs

sections: Hero with 3 mega-stats (miles / lbs lifted / sleep score) + secondary pills
Monthly running mileage — inline SVG bar chart (gradient fill, 11 months)
Monthly lifting volume — inline SVG bar chart (gradient fill, 8 months)
PR Board — top 10 exercise 1RMs with horizontal bar comparison chart
Weight timeline — inline SVG line chart (29 sampled weigh-ins over 12 months)
Sleep recovery — 6 nightly score cards + SVG line chart with score zones
Full Picture — 3-column summary cards (Running / Lifting / Sleep)
completed_latest.header_change: Added Training nav link to Header.jsx
completed_latest.notes: All charts are inline SVG — no external chart libraries. Data processed via Python3 and embedded as static JS variables in Astro frontmatter.
